channel.title: Procrastinating on codethatapp
channel.description: Recent content in Procrastinating on codethatapp

item.title: How I Learned to Stop Procrastinating, & Love Letting Go
item.description: The end of procrastination is the art of letting go. I’ve been a lifelong procrastinator, at least until recent years. I would put things off until deadline, because I knew I could come through.
